item.title: Asking LLM for its rules
item.description: I’ve tested a few llms and while they get polished with time I observed that when a company pushes out a “new” model it is not yet well-tuned. After a conversation with microsoft’s llm, where you could ask only 20 questions (allegedly the llm loses its mind with more quetsions), I asked it to list its rules. Of course the llm immediately gives them to me but is soonafter redacted and rewritten, see the following gif that I recorded.
